extendedInfo.description: Now with Facebook and Twitter upload of Screenshots of Google StreetViews and Maps plus your tagged geolocated pics.Plus directions on foot/car/bike/public transport displayed as text or on maps.NOTE- Developed & tested on a Samsung S2 & HTC Hero. So I don't know how it performs on other phones.Display/resize/move your own pictures around in StreetView then share your tagged Gps positioned pictures on Google StreetView and Google Maps with others by MMS,E-MAIL or upload to FACEBOOK and TWITTER.Plus go from Pin to Pin and see the distances.Track your position, distances and tagged pictures with GPS and instantly share them.Map + Compass.Use predefined tags on map - "Here I Am", or create your own.Add comments to your pictures to be displayed on StreetView/ Map then share with others.Full search facility plus locate by latitude and longitude.

reviews.comment: Will not open on HTC inc.
reviews.author: A Google User
